entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:35 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.7°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of snow over northern sections early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:35 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:35 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:35 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
